data.name: The Fur in Me
data.detailed_description:
The Fur in Me is a 2D single-player platform adventure featuring color based mechanics, beautiful 4k visuals and rich storytelling.

You play as a young Fur on a journey home who finds out his land has been taken by the evil Furbats. Brave as you are, you decide to face them. However, you are not alone! With the power of the magic colors at your side, you will run, jump and smash your way through hundreds of enemies and obstacles, while matching your color with theirs.

Are you ready fur your destiny?

Featuring:


  • Up to 6 different colors that will help you in your journey
  • Around 300 challenges to overcome, all color related
  • 30 levels filled with danger, as you explore mountains, caves, forests, beaches and much more in amazing 4k visuals
  • 15 levels of difficulty that can either make this journey a cakewalk or an absolute nightmare (and I really mean it)
  • A beautiful and original soundtrack
  • Checkpoints before every challenge and really fast respawns
  • An epic story told through over 100 detailed images

With cute visuals, a beautiful soundtrack, lots of challenges, lots of difficulties, a respect for player's time and a really deep mystery to solve, The Fur in Me is a work of love made by a gamer for gamers. Grab your controller or keyboard and enjoy the ride!

(This page is still under construction. As soon as I have more to show, like screenshots and GIFs, I will add them here)

Please, don't forget to add The Fur in Me to your Wishlist, you will be one of the first to play it and I will be eternally grateful! Fur real =P
